## Pre-Processing of Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(readxl)

data = read_xlsx("~/777-project-4/DryBeanDataset/Dry_Bean_Dataset.xlsx")

data = data %>% 
  mutate(
    Class = as.factor(Class)
  )

set.seed(250)
data_val_split = initial_validation_split(data, prop = c(0.6, 0.2), strata = Class)

data_train = training(data_val_split)
data_test = testing(data_val_split)
data_val = validation(data_val_split)

bean_recipe = recipe(Class ~ ., data = data_train) %>% 
  step_normalize()
```

## Classification Tree

```{r}
decision_tree_model = decision_tree() %>% 
  set_engine("rpart") %>% 
  set_mode("classification")

tree_workflow = workflow() %>% 
  add_model(decision_tree_model)%>% 
  add_recipe(bean_recipe)

tree_fit = fit(tree_workflow, data_train)
```
